Package BobcatLib.Subsystems.Swerve.SimpleSwerve.Commands

Class TeleopSwerve

java.lang.Object
edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.Command
BobcatLib.Subsystems.Swerve.SimpleSwerve.Commands.TeleopSwerve
All Implemented Interfaces:
Sendable
public class TeleopSwerve extends Command
Command class for teleoperating a swerve drive system using input from suppliers. This class periodically calculates and applies control values for translation, strafing, and rotation, with optional robot-centric or field-centric control.

  • Constructor Details

    • TeleopSwerve

      public TeleopSwerve(SwerveDrive s_Swerve, DoubleSupplier translationSup, DoubleSupplier strafeSup, DoubleSupplier rotationSup, BooleanSupplier robotCentricSup, ControllerJson controllerJson)
      Constructor for the TeleopSwerve class.
      Parameters:
      s_Swerve - the swerve drive subsystem to control
      translationSup - supplier for translation (forward/backward) control
      strafeSup - supplier for strafing (side-to-side) control
      rotationSup - supplier for rotational control
      robotCentricSup - supplier indicating if the drive should be robot-centric
      controllerJson - parsed configuration details for driver input and limits

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute()
      Periodic execution method called every 20ms during command execution. Calculates drive parameters based on the input suppliers and applies them to the swerve drive system.
      Overrides:
      execute in class Command

    • getRotationStick

      public double getRotationStick()
      Retrieves the current value of the rotation control stick, with the deadband applied.
      Returns:
      the processed value of the rotation stick
